title: Week 1 Big Time Matchups
description:
Wendi Nix, Desmond Howard, Greg McElroy discuss Week 1 matchups, QB battles, and Trevor Matich's Virtual College Tour heads to Eugene, OR where he catches up with the Ducks star defensive end Kayvon Thibodeaux, who hopes to become just the 2nd primarily defensive player to win the Heisman. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The CFB Live crew discusses marquee matchups in Week 1.
